slide.title: Unique indexes
slide.blurb: Unique indexes prevent multiple documents to match the same index key:

div.example: E11000 duplicate key error index: demo.cities.$country_code_1_name_1 dup key: { : "AR", : "Mercedes" }

div.blurb: Remove the offending key and try again:
You can force the index with *dropDups* (|ff9999|This could delete a lot of data!|):
div.example: > db.cities.ensureIndex( { country_code: 1, name: 1 }, { unique: true, *|f10000|dropDups : true|* } );
